data.eml:eml: A study on the apterous genus Clytomelegena Pic, 1928 (Coleoptera, Disteniidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lin, Meiying, Murzin, Sergey V. (2012): A study on the apterous genus Clytomelegena Pic, 1928 (Coleoptera, Disteniidae). ZooKeys 216: 13-21, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.216.3769, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.216.3769
